website_summaries.verdict: Cool and breathable, this ring sling dries quickly after a dip in the pool or ocean, though some find it too tight to wear comfortably.
pros: Breathable mesh fabric dries quickly and keeps both baby and parent cool in summer
Folds up compactly to stow in a diaper bag
cons: Pulls awkwardly and can be too tight for parents carrying heavier babies
Metal ring is heavier than the fabric and can slip down if not properly tied

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfy for Mom and Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I want to love baby wearing but it has always made me hot and those carriers are so complicated. I needed a carrier for an airplane trip with my 4 month old though so I thought I would give the simple ring sling a try. I fell in love with this!!! It's easy once you practice a few times and it didn't make me hot has hell!! Added bonus is my child also loves it! Only big difference is that it is NOT a hands free carrier BUT compared to nothing it's way better!!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2Boys

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice ring sling
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ring sling, and good for the price for sure. It doesn't feel as supportive as the Maya Ring Sling, but it hasn't been a problem. I am using it for my 32lb toddler for occasional use, when she really wants to be close but I really need to be able to use an arm. I'm happy enough with it, but if I was planning daily use I'd probably get another Maya RS (Loaned mine to someone who dropped off the face of the earth lol)
customer_reviews.author: Intrepid Bunch Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great active sling
customer_reviews.text: This sling is a good active sling. You do have to be careful to tie it once you get it where you want it, as the material slides easy and can losen as you move. Because of how thin the material is, it can kind of cut into you if it gets bunched up anywhere around the shoulder. I have another brand which is more of a daily use, which has addittional padding along the edge and a pad on the shoulder by the ring. Very nice for longer wearing, but this one is great for my husband who runs hot, and for any active wear due to the breathability!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkay

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I could never ever figure this out and I'm almost positive it's because the rails (edges) and double seemed and have no give it stretch to them. Every time I tried this it either dug into my neck or into my baby's neck. I even tried a trick from YouTube of rolling a washcloth around the rail by the baby so it's not pressing on them... Nope. Didn't work. The rails are too stiff that when you tighten it as much as you need to it would be painful for you and baby. This was cheap and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This sling is fantastic!! I have the beach baby wrap and ...
customer_reviews.text: This sling is fantastic!! I have the beach baby wrap and wanted the sling but didn't want to pay the beach baby prices. This sling is the same great quality for a more affordable cost. The fabric is light and breathable for both you and baby. Great for our Florida climate! Sling tightens to provide neck support or you can pull it up over baby's head. (Be sure baby can breath.) My two month old falls asleep in it instantly. I take it everywhere with me!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hare

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, not hands free
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, especially for the price. Too bad my baby hated it. She hated all slings I tried to put her in though, so I'm not holding that against them. One this I didn't like is that it's not totally hands free. I wad liking for something hands free and mistakenly thought this was, but it's not :-/ right now I'm debating between the ktan breeze or the infantino 4 in 1.
customer_reviews.author: Annette & John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ring sling!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use while swimming with our 1 month old. And also for when it's hot out. She falls right to sleep in it! Easy to put on and get a good seat. Perfect for swimming and great for hot weather since it gets air flow. It didn't arrive in the package shown though. It came in a tiny box with no instructions or anything so I had to look up how to thread it.
customer_reviews.author: meggieschill

customer_reviews.title: Great product VERY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product VERY easy to use. I seen some posts about the material feeling very 'slippery' but it's more than able to hold my 25 lbs 6 month old while she kicks and swings her arms around. I love this sling, I only wish I got it sooner since my daughter runs hot all other slings made her break out in a heat rash. This keeps her cool and happy and gives me the ability to use both my hands with zero worry. Will be buying this for friends in the future because I'm keeping mine haha.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot summer and a newborn
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, baby enjoys it, cool! In Seoul, it's too hot and muggy. We bought this ring sling to carry the baby around in and so far we both love it! Much cooler and more comfortable than our ergo with infant insert. Not sure how well it will work with a bigger baby but great for a newborn (and doesn't slip)!
customer_reviews.author: Oh

customer_reviews.title: It was light and breathable and baby boy was comfortable. It did slip down
customer_reviews.text: I choose black to match my swimsuit. It worked perfectly for the pool, beach and hanging outside during our beach vacation. It was light and breathable and baby boy was comfortable. It did slip down, off my shoulder frequently when I was positioning because the metal is heavier than the fabric. I think with practice I will figure it out. Overall happy with the purchase and would recommend it for summer water play with mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... who is 24 pounds to the Bahamas it worked great I got it wet and it dried fast and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I went on a cruise with me family with my 9 month old who is 24 pounds to the Bahamas it worked great I got it wet and it dried fast and when I got back on the ship I would just wash it off to get off the salt water I loved it BC my son wants to be held and loves the water so it worked out great and it folds to be small in its own pocket and the design is cute too
customer_reviews.author: nadia covey

customer_reviews.title: Really nice despite being.plastic
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time for a wrap for the summers here, i live without air conditoning in the south so i need a carrier for heat. It hasn't gotten hot yet but it seems well made and was comfortable for my 25lb three year old and my 11lb newborn. I like sling carriers. I also got nyself a gauze cotton carrier for summers as well. The purple color is really pretty as well. I am glad i got the sling and not the wrap style of the mesh, seems like the wrap would be wierd.
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water and Texas summers!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the price. Live in Texas and have to other kids I have to watch while in the water, and with this I am able to grab a hold of them easily while carrying my smallest inthe sling! Also works great with the summer heat. Went to the lake with temps in the high 90s and my baby was kept comfortable without getting in the water. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great sling for side carrying baby in the heat!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant with how slippery this material is, but this sling worked perfectly for carrying baby on the beach, and for walks in the heat on our vacation. Kept us both cool and was easy to clean due to sand, sweat and suntan lotion. Great for a baby who hates to be hot. I did have to practice tightening it with baby in it as it does loosen with wear. I also wouldn't use it hands free but great for sharing the weight of a baby on the hip.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved my life this summer! I have an active 4 year old who loves to swim and go to the local water park. I easily wore my 9 month old and took him to the pool and water park a ton! She often fell asleep on me.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The wrap is good to use if you want to get it wet. However I found it very uncomfortable to use for more than 10 minutes with my 2 month old. was hoping to have more fabric to support my baby’s neck. I ended up switching to a different type and brand of wrap for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It's lightweight, quick drying, super simple to use, and performs well both wet and dry. Love the fact that it allows me to shower with my infant and my toddler quickly and easily. Can't wait to use it in the pool. Highly recommend both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Coker

customer_reviews.title: Worth the 🤑
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for my 11week old. Breathable quick dry fabric. Fabric is very silky so I did have to tighten up a lot and tie the tail into a knot around the rings. I noticed some seam stitch popping as I tightened the rails but didn't see or feel any integrity problems... Will cont to monitor for this
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This wrap is comfortable and cool even when used in Houston's humid and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to carry for medium amounts of time/low amount of space. I have a gemini carrier for longer durations. This wrap is comfortable and cool even when used in Houston's humid and hot summers. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sparty

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a quality sling.
customer_reviews.text: I used this ring sling some with my newborn but now that she is 14 months old, she really enjoys it! She's 19 lbs and instead of a stroller, I can do a combo of carrying her or letting her walk. The sling is light and small so it's easy to throw in a bag and have just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Jordan Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the solar pad!
customer_reviews.text: Having 2 kiddos under 2, this is a must for summer! It's super comfortable and easy to put on and my baby is a happy camper in it! I was using my SSC prior to this, but my daughter wasn't getting much water action through the fabric at the splash pad, so I had to go to amazon to see what I could find. I'm glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Beach & Boat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I've used it on the boat, at the beach and in the pool! Easy to sling baby on while not having to worry about getting wet. I would definitely suggest!
customer_reviews.author: A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble with ring slings before, but this one worked great. Used it with my 2 month old in Hawaii so I could still have free hands to play with my toddler at the beach or pool. Baby seemed happy and comfortable. I even tested carrying my toddler on my hip and she loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: There's a bit less fabric than I'd like (in width where the baby rests) but I imagine ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered, which at the price I purchased it I admit I was hesitant. There's a bit less fabric than I'd like (in width where the baby rests) but I imagine had I paid attention there's measurements on the page. Nice and thin, dries VERY quickly.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: i can't recommend it to carry anything but a doll
customer_reviews.text: too slippery, never stayed in place once I had it (finally) adjusted properly, baby never felt secure, and it dug into my shoulder. overall, i can't recommend it to carry anything but a doll. doesn't seem to bear weight well AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Ruta P.

customer_reviews.title: I do love how breathable it is though
customer_reviews.text: The fabric holds well in the rings without slipping, however, it is very hard to adjust because it pulls all the fabric with it, instead of just the top or bottom. I have a medium/large frame and though it worked, there wasn't very much fabric to work with and it wasn't really wide enough for my baby. I do love how breathable it is though!
customer_reviews.author: Showman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot weather!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is amazing! I have used it on land and in water with my 13 lb infant. It is comfortable, no slippage, and my baby has slept comfortably for hours in it both in and out of the water! It is perfect for our Texas spring and summer!
customer_reviews.author: Angelmommy

customer_reviews.title: Love the way it looks but I'm not sure I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks but I'm not sure I like the small rings. Still trying to get used to it. It worked well in the water but it doesn't feel as secure when I'm just wearing her outside.
customer_reviews.author: Great Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we decided to take our 7 month old baby to the beach. It definitely is a lightweight material which is perfect for hotter temperatures, but it is not very attractive to look at. If you're looking for an affordable sling and don't care about the aesthetic quality, this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: H. Shymanski

customer_reviews.title: I had to take the risk & I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I kinda was In between if to buy it or not. I had to take the risk & I'm glad I did.. I absolutely love itttt... Everything was in the package, works perfectly... I would definitely buy another one. Love it and would for sure buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE being able to wear this into the pool with ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE being able to wear this into the pool with my son!!! Also he gets super hot during the summer so it is GREAT that i can wear this and its not as hot as alot of the other slings and wraps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A much cooler option for baby in the warm, ...
customer_reviews.text: A much cooler option for baby in the warm, humid weather. Sling doesn't slip during use (though I always keep an arm under baby, regardless of the sling position, as a safety precaution). I'm even able to use it to position my baby for nursing.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baby's first beach trip
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sling! It was my first time using a ring sling (my everday carrier is a Solly baby wrap) and I was surprised with how easy it was to use! I took it to the beach to tote my 5 week old and he loved it! He stayed cool and secure! Would definitely reccommend this sling for warm weather use! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does not feel secure, fraying hems and thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap thin fabric, felt very loose, and fraying at hem. I tried this on with my 17 lb baby and there's just no support, does not feel secure at all. Will be returning product.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia's mom

customer_reviews.title: MVP
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my top pick for baby MVP(roduct). He loves how close he is held and I love how secure he feels while I'm able to do other things with my hands. I've even used to to nurse comfortably. The light weight fabric is such a relief compared to other carriers.
customer_reviews.author: VinoRosè

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe and slips
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't hold. The fabric Slips through the rings and never could get baby in comfortably. I returned it and got the other mesh that wraps more like a Moby. Came today, already seems better. Looking forward to trying it in the water in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling! It holds up very well. If you watch a how to use video on ring slings, you should have no problem using this sling. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Still Kicking

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.text: My newborn loves this sling. We have another carrier and she does not relax in it like she does this sling. The only negative is the fabric does slip some when wearing for long periods of time but it's easy to re-tighten. It doesnt let you be 100% hands free but does provide support when carrying baby which makes doing certain tasks and event easier.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: It might work with other babies, but my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: It might work with other babies, but my daughter is very squirmy and can wiggle her way right out of this. I didn't feel safe using it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the sling. Easy to use and it’s breathable... meaning my heatbox of a child is not drenched in sweat and neither am I. Can’t wait to try it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Marley Alessi

customer_reviews.title: It works fine but hard to wear for very long
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but hard to wear for very long, as it makes shoulders and back hurt with all the weight on one side. I prefer a regular baby carrier.
customer_reviews.author: CPark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this ring sling
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this ring sling! So quick and easy! I just wish the tags on the inside were in a different location! My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, looks like photos, good quality and functions as advertised. Would purchase again, and I might have too because It might have gotten taken a water park :(
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Alewel

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The pics make this product look a lot better than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Archer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sling, exactly what I was looking for! I bought it when my daughter was 16 months old and is almost 2 now and we still use it! It is perfect for the beach but we also use it around the house too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Walters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for my under 6 month babe in the water and out. Very light weight for the hot summer months. She was incredibly comfortable. It is super easy to adjust. I love that it folds into its own pocket for easy storage. Just toss it in the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Cambria Decker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this sling its perfect for the summer time, its quality is great, my baby loves it, & its very comfortable to use. I can't say enough good things about this sling it is truly amazing & extremely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped this Grandma carry and play with all kids at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: G L

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this to take on vacation and it worked great for our 7 month old
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take on vacation and it worked great for our 7 month old. We spent a lot of time hiking and on the beach. It worked great and dried quickly when it got wet.
customer_reviews.author: dshier

customer_reviews.title: This product is exactly what it seems to be. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it seems to be. I would have given five stars, but I ordered gray and received black.
customer_reviews.author: TClark

customer_reviews.title: It is VERY breathable and comfortable for summertime babywearing
customer_reviews.text: The ring sling in general has a bit of a learning curve to it, but after figuring out this sling, my 3-month-old loves to be worn and most of the time falls asleep in the sling! I can't wait to use it at the beach. It is VERY breathable and comfortable for summertime babywearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: I love this sling
customer_reviews.text: I love this sling, perfect for hot days . I pretty much wear it everywhere. Thank you so much for such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: John Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and airy
customer_reviews.text: Such a great, lightweight baby sling! It's easy to put on and is definitely cool enough to wear in the heat of the summer. My daughter seems to like it enough for me to use it more than a couple times. I can't wait to try it out in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen J. Landreth

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight material
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight material. My little stayed nice and cool at the beach and was able to wear her in the water while also being able to attended to my other children.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goldmann

customer_reviews.title: Baby Necessities
customer_reviews.text: I love this ring sling! I live in south Texas and the heat has made it difficult for baby and I to sling without sweating. This sling has such soft breathable material that baby loves :) It is very easy to put on and gives excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the house with my 5 month old
customer_reviews.text: I've had this about 2 weeks, I've been pretty happy with it so far. It's been perfect for around the house when my 5 month old daughter won't let me set her down. I havnt used it for much longer then 30 minutes, but it's been easy to use and feels secure.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mesh ring sling for the water!
customer_reviews.text: I've loved wearing my little one in this in the pool this summer! Easy to put on and very comfortable. Nice metal rings. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price! We used this at Disneyworld and it saved my sanity (and my muscles). I have a 27 pound one year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool for hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: Helpful, but not as secure as described. Not really hands free carrying. Very much cooler than the large wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Eden's Grandi

customer_reviews.title: I personally love the lucky baby ring sling
customer_reviews.text: I personally love the lucky baby ring sling! It's so easy to use and comfortable! Love how breathable it is for the summer so it's not so hot for me or my baby! Highly recomended!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, not complicated, easy to use. Love being hands free and able to still hold my baby!
customer_reviews.author: fraetta

customer_reviews.title: Maybe next year...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get it just right despite watching tutorials. Will try again next summer when she's bigger.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: What did I do without it
customer_reviews.text: I love this one I bought several but this is the only one I use
customer_reviews.author: lori mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Easy beezy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and travel with,nice and cool for the Texas weather. Currently using with 2mo and it holds her pretty well, I still use 1 arm to brace her as baby tends to move to one side instead of the middle.
customer_reviews.author: eo

customer_reviews.title: A real life saver at the pool with my infant ...
customer_reviews.text: A real life saver at the pool with my infant and older kids this summer. Not totally hands free all the time but definitely provides enough support when the other kids need both of my hands for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard for me
customer_reviews.text: I know its good but I didn’t know how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: batool

customer_reviews.title: Not plus size friendly IMO
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for plus size moms even though others did... If you're a size 22 or above this may not work for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for my 3 month old boy. The sling is comfortable and breathable...great for Texas summers.
customer_reviews.author: TwinBoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to do and is as advertised. I've just used it to give baby support while I shower but I hope to use it at the beach and pool for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I did not like it and felt like my baby would fall out
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it and felt like my baby would fall out... I bought one from buy buy baby instead
customer_reviews.author: April Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for anyone with a small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anyone with a small baby or toddler that must be carried on the beach! This will save your back and your arms!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Easy, light and great to beat the heat
customer_reviews.text: So grateful we had this for vacation and looking forward to having it for this summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great at the pool
customer_reviews.text: Works great at the pool, dries quickly! My baby loves it too, she often falls asleep in it. Much easier than a traditional baby carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Laura V.

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits in my purse, doesn't make us sweaty and is super quick and easy to put on. No hard to reach buckles and no excessive amounts of fabric to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to work. I even watched YouTube videos on how to use it but I just felt uncomfortable wearing my 3 month old in this sling. I really wanted it to work because she doesn't like to be put down and I can't get anything done. I had a difficult time keeping her in the right position. I was so afraid she was going to slide right out I finally gave up after trying it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Sophlla

customer_reviews.title: When I received the product the outer box had a ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product the outer box had a very odd residue on it. After then trying it on, I felt that the wrap wasn't secure. I have a 6mo old weighing about 16 lb and the material seemed to just slip and slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ring slings are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and breathable Does not slip!!🙌🏼 Have put up my 2.5year old as well as my 2 month old. Ring slings in general are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: SO far I am pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my 5 month old at an indoor water park - and this summer at the beach. I have a 4 and 2 year old as well. I haven't used it in water yet, just tested it around the house. SO far I am pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light, yet comfortable and fairly supportive. I'm on Arizona so it's nice to have a ring sling that doesn't trap heat.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This material is light weight. The instruction manual really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: BethS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sling for the Beach!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect sling for summer. My 6 month old loved being worn in this sling on the beach. I'm still using it at 8 months for hanging out in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Coker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightweight sling! Wish there was more color choice but the navy blue is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Young

customer_reviews.title: Torn upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: Got today and a fabric that has attached to the Rings is torn
customer_reviews.author: Audire

customer_reviews.title: We love it! It's lightweight and easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It's lightweight and easy to use and the baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It first stay tight, it bunched up by the neck, and OT is tight...no matter what under the legs of my little. But it is ok!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can carrie my granddaughter around and my back does not get tired.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, stayed put in the pool and at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: C. E.

customer_reviews.title: I'd tighten it to where the material would stretch to the perfect size but the edges of the material aren't stretchy ...
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this. But it just wasn't what I anticipated. The material is almost TOO stretchy. I'd tighten it to where the material would stretch to the perfect size but the edges of the material aren't stretchy and they cut into baby's legs causing marks and he hated it. Didn't feel secure at all with the thin to stretchy material. I tried many many times using different techniques. My 5mo old weighs 20lbs and it pulled awkwardly non my shoulder and thus my neck. If i pulled the shoulder part down my arm I lost most mobility in that arm. Just overall uncomfortable for larger kids.
customer_reviews.author: heather miller

customer_reviews.title: Is really possible and sure for the baby use the Sukkiri with “legs in”?.
customer_reviews.text: Srs. customer_reviews.text: Great wrap for hot weather. Shoulder placement takes some practice though. It can be a little tight to the neck at times.

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 different slings and this one is WAY better. It's breathable and easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear feral foster puppies so they could get used to humans. I bought 2 different slings and this one is WAY better. It's breathable and easy to wear.

customer_reviews.title: The sling is pretty nice but definitely not as nice as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered light blue and received black. The sling is pretty nice but definitely not as nice as I expected. Out of my 5 baby carriers this would be my least favorite. Shipped fast and good packaging though.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I consider the $60 beach baby but thought I would give this a try because I've had free returns. I am so glad I bought this first I've used it numerous times with my six-month-old chubby girl and it's been absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't like getting into any baby wearing device
customer_reviews.text: The sling itself is what I expected but my baby's reaction to it is not. He doesn't like getting into any baby wearing device, of which I have several types. But he always calms down within a minute or two and often falls asleep. However, with this sling he never settled. I re-tried it several times for about a month with no luck. I wonder if he doesn't feel as secure in it since nothing wraps BETWEEN/under his legs like other wraps do....
customer_reviews.author: Abby S.

customer_reviews.title: Item pictured is not color purchasing. COLOR is GREY
customer_reviews.text: Picture shown is misleading if you don't read complete product description. Actual item you are purchasing is GREY not BLUE. :(
customer_reviews.author: 30 Something Mom

product_meta.title: Lucky Baby Ring Sling with Breathable, Quick-Dry Mesh Fabric, Fashionable & Adjustable Carrier, Perfect for Summers, Beach, Pool & Shower. Suitable for Infants - Toddlers and All yr Babywearing. Grey
feature_bullets: Lucky Baby's SUKKIRi is a Top Rated baby sling, and The Original. It's light weight, breathable & cool for the really hot summers, making babywearing easier. This mesh ring sling can be adjusted for Both Moms and Dads to use, so no need to buy extra carriers that only fit one parent. It's Excellent for beach/pool vacations - the fabric is soft and comfortable in and out of the water and dries quickly.

Recognized by the International Hip Dysplasia Institute as "hip-healthy", offering Ergonomic & Lumbar Support, which means baby's hips and spine are correctly aligned. Passed CPSC and ASTM International Baby Safety Standards, which means your baby is safe and secure in a strong yet soft baby carrier. Sukkiri offers Hands Free Support, Its aluminum rings are completely adjustable and can be used for newborns to toddlers, skinny or plus sized parents, tall or short parents.

Compact and portable. Folds up nice and small so you can keep it in your purse or pocket for when you are running errands OR traveling OR if you have a clingy baby who does not want to be put down. The Top and Bottom Rail are easily distinguishable, so it makes it especially easier for parents who are new to babywearing, to adjust the baby sling. Sukkiri is a Premium Quality Baby Carrier that is equally comfortable for both Parents and Babies.

Great baby gear whether you're at home or travelling because it's Comfy & Super Easy to use. (Additional carrying instructions are sent in your first email). Sukkiri can be used for privacy while breastfeeding, PLUS baby can be carried in different positions: (1) Front facing, (2) side on either hip or (3) backpack. Use knot-less ties for infants and knotted ties for toddlers and heavier babies.

Fabric is soft YET STRONG and won't rub against your neck. It's easy to clean, Premium Quality, machine washable, and it's pretty too. For more information, please scroll down to check out the Description AND view your discount offer.
